data.title: 2024 Kids 4 Harmony Summer Gala Concert
data.text:
Our Kids 4 Harmony Gala at Ozawa Hall at Tanglewood on June 25th

was a huge success!

Thank you from all of us for your support, enthusiasm, and attendance at this year's Summer Gala Concert event. We hope you enjoyed the experience and will bring your family and friends to a future Kids 4 Harmony performance! Each year, the Summer Gala Concert raises funds supporting Kids 4 Harmony, a youth development program of 18 Degrees.

Please enjoy and share the videos below, including the performance recording, family and student interviews.

Our seniors, Ethan and Tyler, poignantly spoke of the impact Kids 4 Harmony has made in their lives:

"What I have gained from Kids 4 Harmony as a whole is invaluable and I truly believe this is one of the greatest programs for young people in the country." - Ethan, heading to University of Missouri Kansas City as a Viola Performance Major.

"Without this program I wouldn't have learned leadership, independence, and the skills required to play a stringed instrument . . . I wouldn't be going to college or have the thought of majoring in anything music related." - Tyler, heading to Westfield State University, majoring in Music Therapy.

Your participation and generosity helps us sustain this youth development program of 18 Degrees into the future.

Please consider making your first-time or additional donation today!

About Kids 4 Harmony

Kids 4 Harmony, a program of 18 Degrees, provides ensemble-based string instruction with a focus on musical excellence, student well-being and development, and family support. Kids 4 Harmony is provided to families in Pittsfield and North Adams at no cost to them, thanks to the generosity of our donors. To become a supporter, visit 18degreesma.org or use the Make a Donation button at the top of this page.

Questions?

Please contact Aimee Annicharico, Director of Development, (413) 448-8281 ext. 236

18degreesma.org

18 Degrees Inc. is a registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization. Tax ID 04-2226238.
